title: Velvet Void
tags: K-R&B, Neo-Soul, Dream Pop, Lo-fi hip hop, Chillwave, Melancholic
prompt:
[Verse 1]
The sound is off, the room is white
Just pencil lines in fading light
A hollow space behind my chest
Where heavy thoughts are laid to rest
The air is still, the dust is, too
A grayscale photograph of you
No, not of you... just of the frame
Where I forgot to speak your name

[Chorus]
And oh, I'm sinking slow and low
Into the velvet void I know
This heavy comfort, soft and deep
A quiet promise I can keep
No need to feel, no need to try
Just indigo in my mind's eye
A beautiful and numb embrace
Losing my sense of time and place

[Verse 2]
My fingers trace a surface, black
A single touch and no way back
The ripples start, a silent bloom
To fill the corners of the room
The beat drops out, I'm holding breath
A lovely, temporary death
Suspended in the atmosphere
There is no pain, there is no fear

[Chorus]
And oh, I'm sinking slow and low
Into the velvet void I know
This heavy comfort, soft and deep
A quiet promise I can keep
No need to feel, no need to try
Just indigo in my mind's eye
A beautiful and numb embrace
Losing my sense of time and place

[Bridge]
They say the ache will come for me
A tidal wave of memory
But in the space where sound should be
A lush and dark eternity
This sweet surrender feels like grace
A stillness nothing can replace

[Chorus]
And oh, I'm sinking slow and low
Into the velvet void I know
This heavy comfort, soft and deep
A quiet promise I can keep
No need to feel, no need to try
Just indigo in my mind's eye
A beautiful and numb embrace
Losing my sense of time and place
